CustomField.description: A value in this field displays a help icon next to the field on the form. Hovering the cursor over the help icon displays a text box with the help text field's content to assist the user in understanding the nature of the question.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A value in this field displays a help icon next to the field on the form. Hovering the cursor over the help icon displays a text box with the help text field's content to assist the user in understanding the nature of the question.
CustomField.label: Help Text
